duties_responsibilities.duty: Interview patients at workstation or at bedside to obtain all necessary account information.
Understand/explain policies regarding services, pricing, insurance billing, and payment of account.
Verify all insurance and obtain pre-certification/authorization.
Process patient charts according to paperwork flow needs and established productivity standards.
Meet/exceed performance expectations and complete work within the required timeframe.

education_certification.credential: Proficiency in Microsoft Office applications and others as required.
